message: I have a great deal for you on this product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
That price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $85. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've got a minimum price in mind. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $105.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $105 is still a little more than I'm comfortable paying.  How about $95? I'm really interested in the product, and I think this is a fair price for both of us.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $102.50.
